scripts.setup:
node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const envContent = '# Cohere API Key - Get from https://dashboard.cohere.ai/
COHERE_API_KEY=your_cohere_api_key_here

# Google Places API Key - Get from https://console.cloud.google.com/
# Enable Places API and Geocoding API in your Google Cloud Console
GOOGLE_PLACES_API_KEY=your_google_places_api_key_here
'; fs.writeFileSync('.env.local', envContent); console.log('.env.local created! Please add your API keys.');"
